title: Mini Windows 7 that loads in RAM?

forumNotes.author: Peter80
forumNotes.content: I am looking for Windows 7 iso, that contain minimum components, and that i can install on usb and when it boots to be able to load it in ram memory, so it can run from ram and not from the usb drive. Is there such a thing?

forumNotes.author: steve6375
forumNotes.content:
Probably. I think you mean WinPE which runs in RAM as drive X:. There are WinBuilder projects for Win8 and 10 - does it need to be 7\>

WinPE only stays up for a limited time (1-3 days) before rebooting automatically as it is not intended as a full OS.

Win7 has no support for USB 3 unless you add in drivers.

64-bit or 32-bit?

What do you want to do/run under this OS?
